title.en: Suterareta Jimi Oujo wa Byakurou Denka ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: 捨てられた地味王女は白狼殿下に溺愛される

altTitles.ja-ro: Suterareta Jimi Oujo wa Byakurou Denka ni Dekiaisareru

description.en:
In the Kingdom of Acacia, royalty are born with blonde hair, silver hair, blue eyes, etc. Everyone is born gorgeous and good-looking. The third princess, Caroline, who was born with chestnut hair and ink-blue eyes in such a beautiful kingdom, has lived her whole life in a detached palace because her family hates her as a “plain princess”. Her sister used her as an outlet for her stress, and her family forced her to work every day. One day, she receives a summons from her father and rushes to the audience chamber, where she finds Leinhard, the crown prince of Tuscany, a kingdom inhabited by beastmen. He also has snow-white ears and a tail, and suddenly asks her to marry him, claiming that they are “mates of destiny. 
A fantastical Cinderella story begins, in which a lonely princess, abandoned by her family, is sweetly and passionately doted upon by the beastly crown prince of a neighboring kingdom!
